Description.Name: Inferno Fluid Gun Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Volatile liquid that is extremely effective at overheating a target because of its adhesive properties. Inferno Fluid Gun Ammo Bins each contain 20 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.
